item.title: CVE-2021-44228 and Genuitec
item.dc:creator: timwebb
item.description:
An internal audit confirms Genuitec does not use log4j2 on our servers and is not impacted by the CVE-2021-44228 vulnerability.

The post CVE-2021-44228 and Genuitec appeared first on Genuitec.

item.title: CodeTogether 5.0.1—FIXES, Fixes, fixes
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description:
CodeTogether 5.0.1 is a maintenance release with improvements to core areas like simultaneous typing and content assist.

The post CodeTogether 5.0.1—FIXES, Fixes, fixes appeared first on Genuitec.

item.title: CodeTogether 5 with Audio & Video
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description:
CodeTogether 5 now includes integrated communication tools including audio, video, screen sharing, text chat and polls.

The post CodeTogether 5 with Audio & Video appeared first on Genuitec.

item.title: CodeTogether 5 with Audio & Video—Sneak Peek
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description:
CodeTogether 5 with audio and video calling, text chat and screen sharing is coming soon! Here's a sneak peek.

The post CodeTogether 5 with Audio & Video—Sneak Peek appeared first on Genuitec.

item.title: CodeTogether 4.2—Write/Run Tests for TDD and Extreme Free Usage
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description:
CodeTogether 4.2 now available! Run remote unit tests and remote launches from the host. On-premises customers get a metrics dashboard.

The post CodeTogether 4.2—Write/Run Tests for TDD and Extreme Free Usage appeared first on Genuitec.

item.title: CodeTogether 4.2 with Test Running—Sneak Peek
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description:
CodeTogether 4.2 with Test Running is coming soon! Here's a sneak peek.

The post CodeTogether 4.2 with Test Running—Sneak Peek appeared first on Genuitec.

item.title: CodeTogether 4.1.2—Summer Refresh
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description:
CodeTogether 4.1.2 is now available with fixes for content assist and remote development in VS Code, support for Oracle IDCS and Keycloak as SSO providers, and other fixes in SSO support.

The post CodeTogether 4.1.2—Summer Refresh appeared first on Genuitec.

item.title: CodeTogether 4.1—Server Sharing, SAP ABAP Support & Coding Enhancements
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description:
CodeTogether 4.1 is now available! Server sharing, SAP ABAP support, rename refactoring, plus Open Symbol and Full File Content Search across all clients.

The post CodeTogether 4.1—Server Sharing, SAP ABAP Support & Coding Enhancements appeared first on Genuitec.

item.title: MyEclipse 2021.5.24—Refreshed and Refined!
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description:
MyEclipse 2021.5.24 is available and it's full of exciting enhancements! New & improved editors, Java 15 & 16 support, Tomcat 9 embedded server, new Spring tooling with Docker integration, Jakarta EE 9 support, Quarkus & OpenShift tooling updates, Eclipse 2021-03, and more.

The post MyEclipse 2021.5.24—Refreshed and Refined! appeared first on Genuitec.

item.title: MyEclipse 2021 Sneak Peek—Awesome AF
item.dc:creator: Aaron Lara
item.description:
MyEclipse 2021 is coming soon! Take a sneak peek at some of the awesome additional features (AF) coming your way.

The post MyEclipse 2021 Sneak Peek—Awesome AF appeared first on Genuitec.

item.title: CodeTogether 4.0—More Goodness for All, Especially Teams
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description:
Now available in CodeTogether 4.0: call & type hierarchies, Teams offering with write access terminals & team-centric UX, single sign-on for On-Premises, and more!

The post CodeTogether 4.0—More Goodness for All, Especially Teams appeared first on Genuitec.

item.title: SDC 2021.02—Updated JREs & JDKs, Big Sur Support & More
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description:
Secure Delivery Center 2021.02 is here with a number of exciting updates. For starters, you’ll get upgraded JREs and JDKs. Also included in this release: optimized memory consumption, the ability to notarize apps for compatibility with macOS Big Sur, and support for self-signed certificates. Read on for the details!

The post SDC 2021.02—Updated JREs & JDKs, Big Sur Support & More appeared first on Genuitec.

item.title: CodeTogether 3.2—Shared Terminals are Here!
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description:
Now available in CodeTogether 3.2: read-only terminal support, better editor colors in Eclipse & IntelliJ, an improved CodeTogether view and more!

The post CodeTogether 3.2—Shared Terminals are Here! appeared first on Genuitec.

item.title: CodeTogether 3.1 with Console Sharing, Access Control & More
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description:
CodeTogether 3.1 is now available with console sharing, access control, non-project file access, on-premises improvements and key fixes.

The post CodeTogether 3.1 with Console Sharing, Access Control & More appeared first on Genuitec.

item.title: CodeTogether 3.0 – Now with IDE to IDE Support and More!
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description:
Now available in CodeTogether 3.0 - heterogeneous IDE to IDE support! Beyond this, we’ve also added the ability to type simultaneously in the same file. Syntax highlighting for several user requested languages as well as a few bug fixes round out this release.

The post CodeTogether 3.0 – Now with IDE to IDE Support and More! appeared first on Genuitec.
